comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Bytown Brigantine, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35332506@N05
comment._content:
We are a youth sail training organization and we would love to share our photos with you and view any new photos you get.  

Thanks, 

Mary

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: NMM – any thoughts on the different spellings of "Parma" vs. "Pamir"? I've seen it spelled both ways – even on the same page! Alan Villiers resources favor "Parma" [NMM]; [Wikipedia1], while many others lean to "Pamir". [National Library of Australia]; [Wikipedia2]. "You like tomato and I like tomaeto ..." ;-) Maybe it's a result of translation ... by any name, she's a beautiful ship!
